message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm willing to part with for a price of $150.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, but I am looking to keep my budget under $150. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down?

Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer the product to you for $145. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really appreciate the value it brings.
